structure.unit: STATE LIBRARIES -- LIBRARIANS -- STATE ARCHIVES AND RECORDS

law.text: Subject to applicable provisions of law, the department shall promulgate rules and regulations governing the transfer of records from the custody of one (1) state or local agency to that of another.
law.history: Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 43. -- Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 49, sec. 16.
